title: Sooo Riot, about Sona?
body:
You sure are piling on the nerfs to her and everything she uses, it's a lot of attention you have given to a champion with next to no comments made by Riot as to why?

Sona is hurting right now, she sports THE lowest winrate in 0-25 minute games now out of all the supports because you are so gated behind items and levels you need, making a support scale so harshly on levels is just idiotic because hardly any support gets to 16 because most games are over before 25 mins, plus there are plenty of supports out there over her lategame winrate that don't have to deal with such a torturous earlygame
Now it looks like you are rolling out nerfs to healing and shielding items, completely confused as to why since tank supports rule botlane right now

What do you want Sona players to do?
Do you really think locking Sona behind a massive scaling wall of items and levels is a good idea?
Do you think her kit is so unhealthy it needs to be forced to be bad?
If you think yes then is Sona going to be getting a rework?

It's always so difficult to get anyone from Riot to speak up when they nerf Sona, happened with her rework, happened with previous hard nerfs in the past dating back to the season 1 healer support purge

replies.body:
Please show me where she is doing so well?

Sure in games where they last for 45 mins she does well, but most games don't last that long
In this current speedball meta it seems like they have purposely made it so Sona can't function in it

Stupid of you to suggest Leona in a 1v1 since her passive needs a teammate to proc it, that's what a lot of her magic damage comes from
The threat only exists if she has a adc with her

In reality it would go like this

Sona: Q's Leona for 10% of Leona's HP 
Leona: Responds with E into Sona's face while Leonas ADC follows up
Sona: Stunned and lost half her HP spamming flash in the opposite direction, her ADC having no good option to fight 1v2
Leona: Q's Sona and her W goes off
Sona: Dead
